name: Pallof Press
how_to_perform:
1. Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and grip a cable or resistance band with a handle in each hand. Hold the cable at chest height.
2. Engage your core by drawing your belly button towards your spine, ensuring that your hips do not sway or rotate throughout the movement.
3. Slowly press the cable away from your body, keeping it at a 45-degree angle to your torso and avoiding unwanted rotation of your trunk.
4. Continue pressing the cable until you reach the top point of the motion, then slowly return to the starting position without letting the band snap back towards your chest.
5. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions on each side.
short_summary: The Pallof press is a resistance-based exercise that targets the obliques and improves rotational strength.
